channel.title: Amazon Web Services Service Status
Current service status feed for Amazon Web Services.
channel.generator: AWS Service Health Dashboard RSS Generator

item.title: Informational message: Increased Error Rates
item.description: Between 06:08 PM and 07:20 PM PDT, users experienced elevated error rates and latencies in the US-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

item.title: Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Connectivity Issues
item.description: Between 7:10 AM and 8:57 AM PDT we experienced increased packet loss for some VPN connections to the AP-SOUTHEAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

item.title: Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Connectivity Issues
item.description: Between 7:10 AM and 8:57 AM PDT we experienced increased packet loss for some VPN connections to the AP-SOUTHEAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

item.title: Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Connectivity Issues
item.description: Between 7:10 AM and 8:57 AM PDT we experienced increased packet loss for Direct Connect connections to the AP-SOUTHEAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

item.title: Informational message: [RESOLVED] Increased Error Rates
item.description: Between 06:08 PM and 07:20 PM PDT, users experienced elevated error rates and latencies in the US-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

item.title: Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Error Rates for Amazon ECR Push / Pull APIs
item.description: Between 5:50 PM and 6:45 PM PDT we experienced an increased API error rate for push and pull APIs in the US-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is now operating normally.

item.title: Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Error Rates for Amazon ECR Push / Pull APIs
item.description: We can confirm increased API error rate for push and pull APIs in the US-EAST-1 Region and are currently working to resolve the issue.

item.title: Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Predict API Error Rates and Latencies
item.description: Between 5:40 PM PDT and 7:05 PM PDT we experienced an increased error rate and latencies for the Predict API in the US-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

item.title: Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Predict API Error Rates and Latencies
item.description: We are investigating increased Predict API error rates and latencies in the US-EAST-1 Region.

item.title: Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Elevated error rates
item.description: Between 5:53 PM and 6:45 PM PDT, users experienced increased errors impacting the use of the AWS Management Console. The issue has been resolved and the Console is operating normally.

item.title: Informational message: Elevated error rates
item.description: We are investigating increased error rates for the AWS Management Console

item.title: Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Provisioning and Instance Registration Times
item.description: Between 6:04 PM and 6:54 PM PDT we experienced increased provisioning and instance registration times for load balancers in the US-EAST-1 Region. Connectivity to existing load balancers was not affected. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

item.title: Informational message: Increased Provisioning and Instance Registration Times
item.description: We are investigating increased provisioning and instance registration times for load balancers in the US-EAST-1 Region. Connectivity to existing load balancers is not affected.

item.title: Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased API Error Rates
item.description: Between 5:53 PM and 6:45 PM PDT we experienced increased error rates and latencies for the EC2 APIs in the US-EAST-1 Region. Running instances were not affected. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

item.title: Informational message: Increased API Error Rates
item.description: We have identified the root cause for the increased error rates and latencies affecting the EC2 APIs and Management Console in the US-EAST-1 Region and are working to resolve the issue

item.title: Informational message: Increased API Error Rates
item.description: We are investigating increased error rates and latencies for the EC2 APIs in the US-EAST-1 Region.

item.title: Informational message: [RESOLVED] Network connectivity
item.description: Between 2:38 AM and 3:06 AM PDT we experienced connectivity issues for some instances in the US-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
